metadata.dc:description: Clinic and analytic findings in 18 children showing severe neurological symptoms, following administration of one dose of anti-whoopingcough vaccine are revised. Possible relationship between both circumstances is discussed and favouring factors of outcoming complications are analysed for each patient in order to establish contraindications to be expected from the use of this vaccine.

[Pertussis inoculation and neurological complications (author's transl)].
